name: Honor Thy Familiar - Ladies Vintage Look Witch Tee - Variety Colors and Sizes
description:
'Honor Thy Familiar' Ladies Vintage Look Witch Tee

A lovely tribute to our feline familiars, always by our sides. Ink color is a soft, sage green that looks beautiful on every color of these super soft, very popular LA-T vintage look shirts.

- LA-T brand Ladies
- 5.5 oz., 50% combed ringspun cotton/50% polyester vintage heathered jersey knit t-shirt.
- Softly shaped classic feminine fit.

Shirt Colors available: Olive, Brown, Burgundy, Charcoal and Navy.

This item is available in the following sizes---

Sizes: S, M, L, XL, 2X

Sizes are as follows:

Small = 2-4
Medium = 6-8
Large = 10-12
X-Large = 14-16
2XL = 18-20

Shirts are shipped first class for both domestic and international.

We also do custom screen printing orders. Please contact for quotes and personal service!

name: 6 Fun Family Shirts for Your Holiday Get Together - Christmas - Yule - New Years
description:
How fun is it to have matching tee shirts for your holiday family get together? Your family name, a funny logo... Yes, families really do this!

This listing is for 6 tee shirts (your choice Gildan 100% cotton or Gildan 50/50 blend) any color and one color ink on front or back.

The price is the base price of 6 shirts, one color ink, sizes small - 5X. I do require a minimum of 6 shirts, but can print any amount over 6 to suit your needs. Price breaks are available as quantities increase. (Next price break is 12 shirts for $8.25 each, 24 shirts for $7.50 each.)

Sizes are adult small to 5X and sizes can be mixed to suit your needs.

Artwork either supply your own or I can create - there is no charge for basic artwork and no setup/screen fee since I reclaim my screens.

Please do NOT purchase this listing - PLEASE CONTACT ME TO CREATE A CUSTOM LISTING FOR YOU as each customer's needs are specific. 

Shirt colors available:

Ash, Azalea (hot pink), Black, Carolina Blue, Daisy (bright yellow), Dark Chocolate, Dark Heather (dark gray), Forest Green, Garnet, Gold, Heliconia (deep pink), Irish Green, Jade Dome (green blue), Kelly Green, Kiwi, Lime, Lt. Blue, Lt. Pink, Maroom, Natural, Navy, Orange, Orchid (lilac), Paprika, Purple, Red, Royal Blue, Sand, Sapphire, Sky Blue, Sport Grey, Tan, Tennessee Orange, Texas Orange, White

Ink colors available: Black, White, Red, Royal Blue, Kelly Green, Yellow, Soft Pink, Soft Orange, Mint Green, Gray, Lt. Blue

PLEASE, PLEASE ORDER BY DECEMBER 10 TO ENSURE YOU RECEIVE THEM BY CHRISTMAS!

categories.name: Custom Screen Printing and Full Color Digital Apparel

name: 12 Full Color Custom Printed Kids Party Shirts - Birthday, Holiday, Fun
description:
This listing is for 12 custom printed children's party shirts. Shirts are printed using a high-tech, high quality heat transfer process.

These shirts are super fun, colorful and created just for your child! Custom kids' shirts are a great way to make your child's party special and still keep costs down for parents... and every kids loves to get something from a party!

I normally supply the artwork at no additional cost. I'm happy to create artwork in relation to theme parties, however, due to copyright laws I will not do licensed logos, characters, tv shows, etc., so please don't ask me for Dora graphics, however, I can usually do something similar that is my own creation and will make everyone happy (see sample).

Shirts are white, ash, light pink, light blue, light yellow or light green 50/50 blend Gildan brand.

You can add a shirt for $7 each up to 24. For orders over 24, there is a price break.

*PLEASE DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS LISTING!  I will create a RESERVE LISTING for you based on your specific needs.  Simply CONTACT me and I will work the details out for you.

Shipping costs will vary on the amount of shirts but shipping generally runs into the $10.95 shipping cost for 12 shirts - USPS Priority Mail.

Please allow 3 weeks for design and printing if possible but I can usually work with rush situations if necessary. 

We also do custom screen printing orders. Please contact for quotes and personal service!

name: Ladies Vintage Look 'Hedgewitch Tee' - S, M, L, XL, 2X, 3X
description:
Are you a Hedgewitch? Then this tee is for you. A beautifully written description that doesn't necessarily kick you out of the broom closet... Just looks cool. ;)  

Shirt reads:

"Walk Between Worlds of Shadow and Light
the Wise-Woman travels in Spirit Flight
Oh, ye Witches of Olde Beyond the Hedge Pierce the Veil and Walk the Edge
with Herbs and Potions that Comfort and Heal
Come Together and Turn the Wheel"

- 5.2 oz., 100% Hanes ComfortSoft® cotton jersey knit t-shirt.
- Relaxed feminine fit.

This item is available in the following sizes---

Sizes: S, M, XL, 2X, 3X

This is a delicious chocolate brown with mauve ink.

First class shipping both domestic and international.

We also do custom screen printing orders. Please contact for quotes and personal service!
